business_account_id.description: The ID of the business account associated with the story.

page_id.description: ID of the page associated with the story.

caption.description: The caption associated with the story.

like_count.description: Number of likes on the story.

media_type.description: Type of media in the story (image, video, etc.).

media_product_type.description: Product type associated with the media in the story.

media_url.description: URL of the media in the story.

owner.description: The user who owns the story.

id.description: ID of the owner of the story.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail of the media in the story.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the story was posted.
